Translations.Text: Dangri, wo yu zhong xianzhi ding yue, yu ni he nu ha, yi bo la xin, mu sa, mai er yan zhizi er sa ding yue, wo yu tamen ding zhuangyan de mengyue
yibian an la xiang chengshi zhe xunwen tamen de chengshi. Ta yi wei bu xindao zhe yubeile tongku de xingfa

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jiyi an la suo ci nimen de endian. Dangshi, di jun lai gong nimen, wo jiu dui tamen paiqian baofeng he nimen suo wei jian de tianbing. An la shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de
Dangshi, tamen cong nimen de shangmian he nimen de xiamian lai gong nimen; dangshi, nimen yanhua xintiao, bing dui an la zuo zhongzhong caice
Zai na shi, xinshimen ceng shoudao kaoyan, bing shou julie de zhendong
Dangshi, wei xinzhe he xinzhong you bing de ren dou shuo:“An la ji qi shizhe, zhi xuwei di ying xu women.”

Dangshi, tamen zhong de yipai ren shuo:“Ye si li bo ren a, nimen bubi zai zheli douliule. Nimen hui jia qu ba!” Tamen zhong de yipai ren, xiang xianzhi gaojia shuo:“Women de fangwu que shi polan de.” Qishi tamen de fangwu bing bushi polan de, tamen yao xiang taozou
Jiaruo zhe zuo cheng bei diren simian gongpo, erhou di jun yaoqiu tamen pan jiao, tamen biding chengnuo. Tamen yinwei ci shi zhi dan yan pianke
Yiqian tamen yu an la que yi yueding, tamen jue bu zhuan bei. An la de mengyue, shi yinggai fuze luxing de
